text: Brickellia vollmeri is a Mexican species of flowering plants in the daisy family. It is native to northwestern Mexico in the state of Baja California.Turner, B. L. 1997. The Comps of Mexico: A systematic account of the family Asteraceae, vol. 1 – Eupatorieae. Phytologia Memoirs 11: i–iv, 1–272Wiggins, Ira Loren 1943. Contributions from the Dudley Herbarium 3: 286Shreve, F. & I. L. Wiggins. 1964. Vegetation and Flora of the Sonoran Desert 2 vols. Stanford University Press, Stanford ==References== vollmeri Category:Flora of Baja California Category:Plants described in 1943
title: Brickellia vollmeri
